/usr/bin/c++  -fPIC   -shared -Wl,-soname,PocketSphinx.node -o PocketSphinx.node CMakeFiles/PocketSphinx.dir/ps.cpp.o  -L/home/pi/pi3/pocketsphinx/PocketSphinx  -L/usr/local/lib -Wl,-rpath,/home/pi/pi3/pocketsphinx/PocketSphinx:/usr/local/lib -lpocketsphinx -lsphinxbase -lsphinxad -lpulse -lpulse-simple -lpthread -lm
